com.here.msdkui.common

Class ThemeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.msdkui.common.ThemeUtil

  • public final class ThemeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience class to access theme attributes.

    • Method Summary

      Gets a string from TypedArray and index of attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • getDrawable

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDrawable(android.content.Context context,
                                                             android.content.res.TypedArray typedArray,
                                                             int index)
        Gets a Drawable from TypedArray and index of attribute.
        Parameters:
        context - the required context.
        typedArray - the array of values.
        index - the index of the attribute.
        Returns:
        a Drawable or null if a raw TypedValue could not be retrieved.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the attribute at index cannot be resolved.

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(android.content.res.TypedArray typedArray,
                                         int index)
        Gets a string from TypedArray and index of attribute.
        Parameters:
        typedArray - the array of values.
        index - the index of the attribute.
        Returns:
        a string or null if a raw TypedValue could not be retrieved.

      • getColor

        public static int getColor(android.content.Context context,
                           int colorAttribute)
        Returns a color value specified by the given theme attribute.
        Parameters:
        context - the required context.
        colorAttribute - a theme attribute such as R.attr.colorBackground.
        Returns:
        a color. In case of errors Color.CYAN is returned.

      • getStyleId

        public static int getStyleId(android.content.Context context,
                             int themeAttribute)
        Returns a resource id for the given theme attribute.
        Parameters:
        context - the required context.
        themeAttribute - a theme attribute whose value is an arbitrary resource id.
        Returns:
        a resource id.
